## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (-14.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), (-16.5, -48.5), (-17.5, -47.5), (-16.5, -47.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-10.5, -49.5), (-11.5, -49.5), (-8.5, -49.5), (-7.5, -48.5)
- Iron Chests for storage at positions (-14.5, -47.5), (-15.5, -47.5), (-12.5, -49.5), (-13.5, -49.5)

### Coal and Iron Ore Storage Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), (49.5, -80.5), (51.5, -79.5), (60.5, -79.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5), (41.5, -78.5)

### Iron Plate Transfer Facility at Position (-12.5, -45.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron Chests at positions (-12.5, -45.5), (-10.5, -45.5), (-8.5, -45.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-12.5, -44.5), (-10.5, -44.5), (-8.5, -44.5)
- Iron Chests for storage at positions (-12.5, -43.5), (-10.5, -43.5), (-8.5, -43.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Missing Iron Chests
- Ensure that iron chests are placed at the intended positions before attempting to interact with them. Verify the position and existence of the chest before executing operations.

### Errors with Full Inventory
- Regularly check the inventory capacity of chests to prevent insertion errors. Plan for additional storage or manage the inventory to avoid reaching full capacity.

### Errors when Placing Entities on Occupied Tiles
- Before placing an entity, ensure the target tile is unoccupied. Remove any existing entities if necessary to free up space for new placements.

### Errors with Empty Source Chests
- Ensure that source chests contain the necessary items before attempting to move or insert items. Regularly monitor and refill source chests as needed to maintain production flow.
